title: Rendez-vous
description: "Rendez-vous" is a long story told by a peculiar narrator, about an ordinary life of an ordinary boy; a life made extra-ordinary by some little odd events which occur as often as he grows up, until the final resolution.This 9400 words novelette won Robot Award in its original language (Italian) and has appeared on Robot, an historic Italian Sci-Fi magazine.
author: Stefano Paparozzi
